verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Lamb is Worthy. (echo) The Lamb is Worthy. (echo) The Lamb who was slain. (echo) He is Worthy. (together){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To receive power. (echo) And the riches. (echo) And the wisdom. (echo) And the strength. (together) And the honor. (echo){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All the glory. (echo) And the blessing. (echo) He is worthy. (together) The Lamb who was slain. (together){/lang-eng}
